fa-view(fa-index="1") fa-view(ng-repeat="card in cards track by $index") include jobcard fa-modifier#helpMod(fa-origin="[.5, .5]", fa-align="[1, 0]", fa-translate="[-37,37]") fa-image-surface.help(fa-image-url="/images/assets/help.png", fa-size="[40,40]", fa-click="clickHelp()") fa-animation(timeline="scrollXPosition", ng-repeat="card in cards track by $index") animate(ng-if="$index <= 2", targetmodselector="{{'#swipeMod'+$index}}", field="translate", startvalue="[0,0,0]", endvalue="[0,-cardSpacing,cardSpacing]") animate(ng-if="$index > 2", targetmodselector="{{'#swipeMod'+$index}}", field="translate", startvalue="[0,0,0]", endvalue="[0,0,0]")
